items.title: Meringue Citron
items.shortDescription: Delicate swirled meringue with lemon curd
items.fullDescription: Our signature lemon meringue features a hand-piped swirl of crisp meringue atop a vibrant lemon curd base. The meringue is torched to perfection, creating a golden exterior while maintaining a soft, marshmallow-like interior. The balance of sweet meringue and tangy lemon creates a perfect harmony of flavors.

items.title: Dôme d'Agrumes
items.shortDescription: Geometric amber dome with edible flowers
items.fullDescription: This stunning amber-hued dome showcases our mastery of modern patisserie techniques. The faceted exterior reveals a honey-citrus gelée encasing delicate edible flowers. Perfect for special occasions, this jewel-like creation pairs beautifully with our afternoon tea service.

items.title: Entremets Pomme Verte
items.shortDescription: Glossy green apple entremet with chocolate leaves
items.fullDescription: Our apple entremet features a mirror-glazed exterior in vibrant green, mimicking the glossy skin of a fresh apple. The sculptural chocolate leaves add an artistic touch to this modern creation. Inside, layers of apple mousse, cinnamon biscuit, and caramel create a symphony of autumn flavors.

items.title: Croissant Framboise
items.shortDescription: Red-tinted butter croissant with berry essence
items.fullDescription: This striking raspberry-tinted croissant is our signature morning pastry. The dough is laminated with butter infused with freeze-dried raspberries, creating not only its distinctive color but also subtle berry notes throughout the 27 layers. The exterior shatters beautifully while the interior remains soft and airy.

items.title: Éclair au Chocolat
items.shortDescription: Classic chocolate éclair with glossy ganache
items.fullDescription: Our chocolate éclair stays true to tradition while achieving perfection in every detail. The choux pastry is baked to achieve a crisp exterior and hollow center, then filled with rich chocolate crème pâtissière. The top is glazed with a mirror-like chocolate ganache and adorned with a delicate gold leaf.

items.title: Cube Noir
items.shortDescription: Minimalist black cube with geometric precision
items.fullDescription: Our signature architectural dessert presents a perfect black cube of extraordinary precision. The velvet-smooth exterior encases layers of dark chocolate mousse, coffee cremeux, and a crunchy praline base. This striking modern creation exemplifies our philosophy of combining artistic expression with exceptional flavor.

items.title: Tour de Macarons
items.shortDescription: Layered macaron tower with pistachio and rose
items.fullDescription: This elegant tower showcases our perfectly crafted macarons in graduated sizes. Each shell features our signature ruffled foot and smooth dome. The delicate pink shells encase a pistachio ganache, garnished with rose petals and pistachios. Equally suited for an afternoon treat or a celebration centerpiece.

items.title: Tarte Rustique aux Pommes
items.shortDescription: Rustic apple tart with caramelized edges
items.fullDescription: Our rustic apple tart celebrates the simple beauty of seasonal fruit. Thinly sliced apples are arranged in a spiral pattern over buttery pastry with folded edges. During baking, the fruit caramelizes and the pastry achieves a perfect golden hue. Finished with a light brush of our house-made apple caramel.
